product_name: CygoLite Streak 280 USB Front Bike Light
long_description: Improve your safety and confidence on rides in dim light with the CygoLite Streak 280 USB front bike light. When it's time to recharge, just plug it into the nearest USB port. The CygoLite Streak 280 USB front bike light illuminates your way with 280 lumens and a beam pattern that's optimized for cycling. Three constant lighting modes include high, medium, low; two special lighting modes include 2-in-1 SteadyPulse(TM) and day flash. SteadyPulse illumination mode combines steady brightness with an alerting flash, letting you see what's ahead of you while simultaneously letting others know your presence. Internal lithium-ion battery charges via computer USB port (charge time of 5 hrs.). Regulated output ensures consistent performance throughout the whole battery cycle; charging indicator lets you know battery status. Includes the CygoLite Metro 280 and USB charge cable.
